rows.label: qst002703_msg0003
rows.name:
Listen...would you entertain me for
a moment?

rows.label: qst002703_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, I'd tried so hard to make it all
work out...but it all ended in failure.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0006
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong, the Love Potion
itself was a roaring success. And my
beloved drank it, just as I'd planned.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0007
rows.name:
But that's when everything went pear-
shaped. The problem was the timing.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0008
rows.name:
Right at that moment, my beloved
bumped into a woman who just
happened to be passing by...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0009
rows.name:
And just like that, he swept her off her
feet with a passion like you wouldn't
believe and ran off into the distance...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0010
rows.name:
My Love Potion is incredibly potent,
so I don't suppose he'll ever look my
way again now...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0011
rows.name:
That potion was my life's work...
I wonder, what was the point of it all?

rows.label: qst002703_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh, you're worried about me?
Well that's very sweet of you.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0014
rows.name:
I once told you I would create a
concoction that would help people
across the world.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0015
rows.name:
Back then, I was only saying that to
manipulate you, but perhaps I can
make that a reality now...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0017
rows.name:
Thank you for letting me burden you
with my woes. I'm feeling a whole lot
better now.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0018
rows.name:
From now on, I shall strive to create
an elixir that will truly bring happiness
to the world!

rows.label: qst002703_msg0019
rows.name:
Just try not to be so trusting in future.
You don't want to be taken in again by
the likes of me!
